meanings.sent1: The flor in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I love to see colorful flors in the park.
meanings.sent3: The flor seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a blooming flor, bright and joyful.
meanings.sent5: The flor's petals glistened in the morning sun.

meanings.sent1: She sprinkled a bit of flor on the cake.
meanings.sent2: The baker sifted the white flor into the mixing bowl.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved making flor disappear.
meanings.sent4: The flour looked like a cloud of white flor in the air.
meanings.sent5: The flor settled softly on the kitchen counter.

meanings.definition: A wine aged under a layer of yeast
meanings.sent1: The sommelier recommended a glass of flor for the meal.
meanings.sent2: The flor had a unique taste due to the aging process.
meanings.sent3: The flor added a special flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the flor filled the room with a rich scent.
meanings.sent5: The flor's golden color hinted at its delicious taste.

meanings.sent1: The vase was adorned with a beautiful flor.
meanings.sent2: The curtains had a lovely flor embroidered on them.
meanings.sent3: The flor on the rug added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was decorated with a delicate flor pattern.
meanings.sent5: The flor on the wallpaper brought life to the room.

meanings.definition: The upper surface of a horizontal architectural member
meanings.sent1: The flor of the beam was intricately carved.
meanings.sent2: The flor of the archway was supported by sturdy columns.
meanings.sent3: The flor of the balcony overlooked the bustling street.
meanings.sent4: The flor of the ceiling was painted with intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The flor of the doorframe was adorned with ornate carvings.
